attributes.action: Scrap road pricing and reduce congestion by making the public transport system CHEAPER, AFORDABLE and better.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I agree with the other petitions against road pricing, but they do not request cheaper and more frequent public transport to encourage us not to use our cars.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap road pricing and reduce congestion by making the public transport system CHEAPER, AFORDABLE and better."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14619.asp
